question: Which of the following gives vivid account of Hanuman's adventures in Ramayan?
explanation: Sundara Kaanda is the fifth book in the Hindu epic, the Ramayana. Composed by Valmiki, it is the only chapter of the Ramayana in which the hero Hanuman. Sundara Kaanda vividly describes the adventures of Hanuman and his courage, bravery and devotion to Lord Rama.
